LinkItem.internal_link_text: How to Integrate Engagement on Android
How to Integrate Engagement on Android

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: EngagementAgent.getInstance(this).startActivity(this, "MyUserActivity", null); // Passing the current activity is required for Reach to display in-app notifications, passing null will postpone such announcements and polls.
